parameter.name: apiUrl
parameter.description: API Url to access the endpoint.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Unique name to identify the connection by.

parameter.name: refreshToken
parameter.description: The refresh token that can be used to obtain a new access token.

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.description: Client ID of the registered application.

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.description: Client secret of the registered application.

parameter.name: tokenEndpoint
parameter.description: An HTTP endpoint that can be uses to obtain an access token.

parameter.name: blocking
parameter.description: Set to true to perform the blocking invocations to Google Spreadsheet.
